data.meta_site_name: Department of Romance and Classical Studies
data.text:
Intensive Intermediate Spanish in Santander

Each summer, the Department of Romance and Classical Studies offers Intensive Intermediate Spanish Language Studies Program in Santander for student to complete the second year of Spanish language study (SPN 250, the equivalent of SPN 201 and 202).

This month-long intensive program will be allow students to complete their second-year language requirement while immersed in the cultural of northern costal Spain. Classes will be help at the Universidad Internacional de Menéndez Pelayo. Students will live with host families.

Spanish Language, Literature, and Culture in Valencia
